sentences.en: And so I'm gwine give you my Prissy fo'yo'own maid. "
sentences.cn: 今儿个 俺要把俺的百里茜送给您,做您的贴身丫头.

sentences.en: I grew to dislike the people from my background – they were uptight and prissy.
sentences.cn: 我开始讨厌和我有相同背景的人－他们很保守，总是一本正经的。

sentences.en: Now, the sight of so many buildings and people completed Prissy's demoralization.
sentences.cn: 此刻, 这么多的建筑物和人进一步把她迷惑住了.

sentences.en: Prissy burst into tears and incoherent mumblings: " Poke!
sentences.cn: 百里茜也放声大哭,断断续续地咕囔着: " 波克!

sentences.en: Prissy edged back up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 百里茜偷偷地往楼梯口退缩.
百里茜在接生方面是个行家呢.

sentences.en: Prissy quickened her gait infinitesimally and Scarlett went back into the house.
sentences.cn: 百里茜这才稍稍加快了脚步,思嘉也回到屋里来.

sentences.en: Prissy rolled her eyes as she looked about her.
sentences.cn: 百里茜转动着两只眼睛向四下里看了看.

sentences.en: Prissy was sitting on the bottom step in the hall, panting.
sentences.cn: 百里茜气喘吁吁地坐在过厅的楼梯脚下.

sentences.en: Prissy, looking up, saw her and her mouth opened to yell.
sentences.cn: 这时百里茜也抬头看见了她,她正要张嘴叫她.

sentences.en: Prissy's mouth fell open and her tongue wagged wordlessly.
sentences.cn: 百里茜张口结舌说不出话来了.

sentences.en: Scarlett dropped Prissy's arm and the wench sank whimpering to the steps.
sentences.cn: 思嘉放开百里茜的胳臂,这女孩便呜呜咽咽地在楼梯上坐下了.

sentences.en: Scarlett glared at her and Prissy shrank back, trying to pull loose.
sentences.cn: 思嘉狠狠地瞅着她,吓得百里茜直往后退, 准备溜走.

sentences.en: She sat upright and gave Prissy a push to speed her feet.
sentences.cn: 她直着腰背坐起来,推了百里茜一把,叫她快跑.

sentences.en: Thank God, Prissy knew all about midwifery.
sentences.cn: 感谢上帝, 百里茜懂得接生的全过程.

words.tran_cn: 为小事挂虑的；谨小慎微的；神经质的

trans.tran_cn: 谨小慎微的，过分讲究的，拘谨的，刻板的
trans.tran_en: behaving very correctly and easily shocked by anything rude – used to show disapproval
